summary: The diff implements the core requirements of REQ-12 across the key files: useVoiceChat.ts (hook with state transitions), VoiceChatInterface.tsx (UI with waveform, status badge, unsupported fallback), AITutor.tsx (Voice Chat tab integration), bioAI.ts (client-side AI response logic), and index.css (voiceBar animation). All major acceptance criteria appear addressed. No missing requirements or hallucinated features are identified.
